Trusted by families in Ruiru and Kiambu County

Transformative Learning for Competent, Confident and Christ-Centered Learners

PCEA Membley School provides a warm, disciplined, and future-ready learning environment from Pre-Primary to Junior Secondary, blending academic excellence, Christian values, and real-world skills.

Headmaster's Welcome

Welcome to PCEA Membley School. Our mission is to shape principled learners who excel academically, grow spiritually, and contribute meaningfully to society. We are grateful for the trust families place in us.

Mrs. L. Wanjiku, Principal
